titles: Times treasury, or, Academy for gentry laying downe excellent grounds, both divine and humane, in relation to sexes of both kindes : for their accomplishment in arguments of discourse, habit, fashion and happy progresse in their spirituall conversation : revised, corrected and inlarged with A ladies love-lecture : and a supplement entituled The turtles triumph : summing up all in an exquisite Character of honour / by R. Brathwait, Esq.
author: Brathwaite, Richard, 1588?-1673.
notes: A ladies love-lecture has special t.p. with the imprint: London : Printed by Iohn Dawson, 1641.
The turtles triumph has special t.p. with the imprint: London : Printed by Iohn Dawson.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
